FixedPointParameter.Name: gain_analog
FixedPointParameter.Description: External gain involved in the echo path. Class II parameter. Default=0x7FFF.

IntegerParameter.Name: aec_delay
IntegerParameter.Description: Number of delay samples for AEC reference line. Class II parameter. Default=0. Max value is 160 in narrow-band mode.

IntegerParameter.Name: ser_delay
IntegerParameter.Description: Number of delay samples for SER reference line. Class II parameter. Default=40. Max value is 160 in narrow-band mode.

IntegerParameter.Name: agc_delay
IntegerParameter.Description: Number of delay samples for AGC reference line. Class II parameter. Default=0. Max value is 160 in narrow-band mode.

EnumParameter.Name: order
EnumParameter.Description: Reference line biquad filter order. Class II parameter. Default=2
